website_summaries.verdict: Although primarily marketed as a foot massager, this deluxe model has the capability to soothe the calves with deep massage for increased circulation and pain relief.
pros: Choice of pressure levels and heat settings
Adjustable "comfort bar" allows you to sit in comfort
cons: It's pricey, and some people say even the lowest level of pressure is too much for them

website_summaries.verdict: From promoting relaxation to soothing a variety of leg and foot issues, this model offers deep shiatsu massage and heat that make it worth the premium price.
pros: Provides deep massage along with relaxing heat for optimal results
Versatile, as it can be used on feet as well as legs
Several intensity levels make it perfect for novices and seasoned users
cons: Highest setting can be painful for new users and sensitive individuals
beginning on the lowest setting is recommended

customer_reviews.title: This comfortable foot and calf massager is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this foot massager out of the box and turned it on, I immediately loved the kneading, massaging action on my feet so much. Then I found the adjustable positioning bar. Wow! I found could angle the massager almost vertically to massage my calves in our comfortable recliner (not reclined, of course). This multi-use massager is great for my tired, tight feet and calves. Its adjustable settings make it a delight to use. I highly recommend this shiatsu foot massager. I think you will love it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: BHewitt2

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for me ....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit based on the good reviews to help tightness in my calves and achilles tendonitis. The unit is solidly built (made in China), applies great pressure and the rollers provide a great massage simulation. The adjustable stand is also great for getting the unit in the right position to be effective. Works great for feet, lower calf and upper calf. This has definitely helped my issues and it just plain feels great on the feet and legs. If I had one complaint it would be that the unit is not particularly effective on the IT band area on the upper side of my calf but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: WOW - pay attention to the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the instructions and started this thing on level 3 or four, and I thought my head was going to pop like a pimple. The unit is VERY well made, the motor is quite powerful. Today is the first time in months that my feet have gotten any relief from the diabetic neuropathy that has been bothering them. This is the BEST purchase I have made in a very long time...DON'T SIT THERE BUY ONE
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S. Zoot

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for very long.
customer_reviews.text: After a year, it stopped working completely. It was expensive enough that it should last longer than a year with minimal use. To me (when it did work) it was painful unless it was on the lowest setting. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J.

customer_reviews.title: Weak machine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading the reviews. It’s a dust collector now. Hits the bottom of the foot only (that’s not what I need), and the side air filled chambers are weak. No deep pressure for ankles and top of the foot like I was in search of. If your looking to massage the bottom of your foot, then this one (like so many others) will work. Those looking for top of the food and ankles this machine is a joke. Waist of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Poor lasted thru August. Right side stopped working.. just ordered a different one with warranty. Ordered a Cheaper one hope it last longer than 30 days.. read reviews and look at stars before you buy...
customer_reviews.author: D L Bordeaux

customer_reviews.title: due to my own painful feet, I have Planta Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the Massage and Reflexology buisness for 15 yers and have owned ever kind of massager from body to feet. I just bought the "Foot Massage Maschine Shiatsu Massagerm, by Cloud Massage, due to my own painful feet, I have Planta Fasciitis, and a pulled calf mussle, weak ankle caused from the tight Hamsring brought on by lots of tennis. This Machine is awesome, I higfhly recommended it to anyone with painful feet, it will make all the difference in the world. I have two sisters that have tried mine out and ready to purchase one for themselves. Thank you for such a wonderful product. Sharon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help with plantar fasciitis. It is a great massager and has actually helped with my pain in the few days ive been using it. The drawbacks i have are: it has a non-adjustable timer...i think 20 minutes? So after this time period, the thing just shuts off and you have to press all the buttons to restart and get back to whatever massage mode you were enjoying, VERY annoying. Second, it will massage a few seconds...then stop a few seconds...then start again...then stop...then start again, etc. This is also annoying as it seems to always stop when it's massaging exactly where i have pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: arrived used
customer_reviews.text: very big and clunky. not easy to move around. better message by getting one that actually does leg and foot. mine arrived used and when I contacted the seller they did not offer to exchange out for me or send me anything to make this right. I ended up having to deal with repackaging a dirty foot machine that I really wanted to just thrown away and then dealing with returning it. Headache. Find a different seller that makes things right
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: massanger cost 200.00
customer_reviews.text: i purchase quite often from amazon but this purchase was a bad one, foot massager is only one year and four months old and now it will not come on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great service......no I would say exceptional service. My plantar fasciitis came back after six months. I was informed that I may have to take another shot in my foot which I did not want to have done again. I looked at alternative methods and truly found one when I began to use the Cloud foot massager. I used it every day until my foot began to feel better and I was able To go on walks again with my wife. My quality of life improved and I did not have to take those shots again which made me feel great about that. I have recommended this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: howard hojnicki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually review things, but this has helped my neuropathy so much I am taking the time. This machine does everything right. A little painful to start out, but I was expecting it as I read about the machine before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: the air billows hold my feet so tight and the massage was aggressive that the nerves on my sole hurts when i walk. the same had happened to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Only Ok
customer_reviews.text: Product suggests to lay flat for calves, but there's no remote which makes turning it on very difficult. Plan on situps for pushing any of the buttons. The Shiatsu sits in one place only; it doesn't move like the back massager. This means it continually rubs one spot but no where else. The inflation and vibration features work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Weak for the size and weight. The menu selection is unintuitive and takes to much time setting it up each session. The vibration is only felt on the heal of the foot and useless. Rollers are nice but not enough compression to make is useful. I am almost a size 12 so I assume smaller feet would have less pressure but do not know for sure. May be enough pressure if you have it on highest setting and sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: hostile

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. But one thing that really was a deal breaker was that the vibrating part in one of the sides stopped after 30 days. This product is amazing. I’ve had leg and foot problems for so many years. I can admit that this will take away all of the pain. I really just wish it didn’t stop the vibrating on my left leg. It has weight to it and it by far doesn’t feel like it has been cheaply made. So just beware.
customer_reviews.author: chedda mayne

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved it and will be using it regularly
customer_reviews.text: My foot/leg massager was waiting just as I arrived home from a 9 hour road trip. I was more than ready to try it out. Ahhhh! I absolutely loved it and will be using it regularly. I have some sciatica issues and numbness in my legs and I can tell this will be a great help. The only problem is I might need to buy another one when my wife discovers how good it is! I have a feeling that we will be using this machine regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Not a premium massager, don’t pay premium money.
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. Adapter stopped working and now I can no longer use the massager. Paid $300 thinking this was a quality massager but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Analyze Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Burning feet, due to neuropathy, has disappeared after two months of use!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular massager due to the uniqueness of the air compression option. This added bonus helps to give my entire foot a massage, not just the bottom. Besides feeling good to my tired feet, it has helped improve my foot numbness/burning sensation due to neuropathy. Before using, I would regularly wake up at night, experiencing a burning sensation. After two months of use, twice a day, I still have the numbness, but I can't remember the last time I awoke with the uncomfortable burning. I read many different product reviews before making my decision. I'm glad I did my homework and chose the best product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Brannon

customer_reviews.title: "Take care of your feet and your feet will take care of you" - Kobe Bryant
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 29 year old guy, around 200 lbs, and have been dealing with plantar fasciitis for a while now. It has been painful to a point where I could no longer go for a run or long walks. I have been considering ordering a foot massager for a while now and am glad I finally went all out and got this top of the line piece of machinery. Works GREAT! Pain was gone after 1 or 2 uses, feet haven't felt this good in years and I'm back to running every day. ORDER THIS RIGHT NOW AND CHANGE YOUR LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty foot and calf massager
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid feeling and powerful unit. It does a great job massaging feet or calves. You can easily set it up on the floor in front of a chair or couch, or use it laying in bed. It has a bar that you can use to adjust the tilt. It has shiatsu style rubbing knobbies and a powerful squeezing mechanism. It worked on my legs and feet (tall male) and my wife's legs and feet (shorter female). My only complaint is that the controls are kind of confusing -- just touch buttons, but the color and blinking indicators need the manual to decode. Once you have a setting you like, it is easy enough to remember that.
customer_reviews.author: David Koski

customer_reviews.title: OMG! THIS JUST GAVE ME LIFE🤗
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've tried so many foot massagers and not one worked. I have plantar fasciitis and bad varicose veins. I though i was going to need to put a bid in for new feet,but now im not so sure. At first I was like ahhh...then I pressed the intensity button and yes CLOUD 9 is the right name for it. This is my first time using it. I'll update this in a months time.... so amazing
customer_reviews.author: Iyanna

customer_reviews.title: Deep tissue massage
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for a couple of days so I will update as to its longevity. I have plantar fasciitis it has bothered me for a couple of years, but lately it has gotten so bad I even had to altar my gait. Have tried pretty much everything short of cortisone shots. Decided to try this after reading some reviews. So far I’m super happy with my purchase. It’s bringing much needed relief to that area. I’m hoping that after a month or so of doing this I will be pain free. This is a deep tissue massage, so be ready to feel some discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager
customer_reviews.text: I am usually pretty skeptical of food massagers of all kinds. I've used plenty and I don't think any have really helped. I have plantar fasciitis so I am constantly rolling my foot over an iced water bottle, but not more. This machine works great. I will say, I am not a big person, so I really had to push back on the massager so that it would actually massage me instead of simply lifting my foot. But once I figured it out it is great! I use it whenever I am watching TV for a bit. It's usually when I stretch after using it that I realize how tight my calves were as well haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.text: I'd just like to take a moment and express my appreciation for this product. You may be skeptical at first due to the price and it not being a name brand item but let me tell you...it is DEFINITELY worth the money. I work 16 hour days and come home knowing my feet will feel so much better when I put them in my Cloud Massager. It massages them better than any product I've ever owned... it's insane! I recommend this product completely.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Burke

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping for a solid foot massage (side and sole). Reviews were mixed so I went ahead and tried it. For anyone wondering, this does not massage the sides of your feet. It only compresses the sides with air. There are no rollers for the sides of the feet. They are all on the bottom. It does a good job on the sole but no matter what I tried, I couldn't get it on the side of my arch. Also, the calf massage wasn't very effective for me. Might be for someone else. Found another massager for cheaper that does the things I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Pischedda

customer_reviews.title: it is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Folks talked about this machine being too intense. I wonder if they bothered to really learn about the different modes and controls because it's adjustable and WONDERFUL one of the best online purchases for me in a long time. I'm so glad I didn't buy that "EL Cheapo" one. I HIGHLY recommend this Cloud Massage machine. Folks complain about it not having a remote, probably just get lost anyway. If bending over and touching a button is way too much for you, than no machine is going to fix how much you've let yourself go.
customer_reviews.author: Topher N

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPER problem
customer_reviews.text: I examined the machine in great detail.It appears to be well made. I could not find any instructions relating to the zipper other than unzipping the air pressure cuff to identify the heating unit. Big mistake. After several hours of attempting to rezip the cuff, I was never able to rezip the cuff to the unit. The zipper is very small and installed so tightly to the housing that it is impossible to maneuver. In complete frustration I returned the unit. I bought the unit based on the glowing review by "girl of peace".
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: ... to help my tired feet that seem to get worse with age
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day for work and can not seem to find the right shoes to help my tired feet that seem to get worse with age. I chose this machine after reading all of the other reviews and it is the best thing for tired feet and legs that I have ever found. I use it every day. I had developed plantar fasciitis and as advertised, this machine has truly eliminated my pain! No kidding. I use it on feet and legs and it has really helped. Highly recommend this product. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Billy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Unusable for standard personal use.
customer_reviews.text: Product was costly, heavy and awkward to move. The large size made it impossible to tuck away. The weight made it hard to change positions. The settings were calibrated so where the lowest setting was still painful. This machine was tested by a 19 yr old male athlete that is conditioned to use commercial equipment, a 20 yr old female that exercises regularly, a 48 yr old male conditioned to physical labor and a 67 yr old female in good physical condition. None of which could use this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine - robust massage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Ive had it for about a month and have used it nearly everyday. It gives a very robust massage. I like it best when it is laying flat for a foot massage. This is more akin to a deep massage technique. Best for average sized people because the machine is built to close pretty tightly around your calf and doesn’t make adjustment for the size of the leg. If you like a very light massage then this is not the machine I would choose. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Too hot on the bottom of feet & after 1 week still not recovered
customer_reviews.text: The rollers got too hot on the bottom of my feet and my feet still have not recovered and it has been over a week.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Great product that does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent product that does the job. My husband uses it for his feet and calves. He has placed the bar in a single position that works for both feet and calves. For feet, he sits on a chair with the device horizontal on the floor. For the calves, he sits on the same chair and just positions the device in a vertical position. It is difficult to change the position of the bar, but this isn't important, since he keeps the bar in the same position for both feet and calves. It's also very gratifying that the seller stands behind the product by providing a free five year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: mary weissman

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foot massager as a birthday gift for my husband. He works outdoors and his job is very physically demanding which causes his feet to ache quite often. It’s now part of his routine to use the foot massager when he gets home and it has helped ALOT! One of the main things I considered when purchasing this foot massager over other competitors was that it works the whole feet from the front to the heels AND that it can be used on your calves as well. The company is very responsive and attentive to the customer as well! Overall, we love this product and use it almost everyday!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gil&Aneska

customer_reviews.title: This works! It helps relieve aches and pains.
customer_reviews.text: I studied long and hard before making this purchase. This machine is so versatile and works for all family members. With the different positions, it is great for feet, ankles and shins. If I lie flat on my stomach, I can even use it on my thighs. A remote would have been a nice added feature, but to be honest, I like the Shiatsu massage, heat, air compression pressure and vibration - so I only ever select the one button that gives me all of these options. My family uses it in the evening while watching television. I would highly recommend the Cloud Massage sold by Happy-Homes. And with the 100% no hassle warranty, you have nothing to lose.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as all the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why this got a lot of really good reviews. I am pretty good with massage and I love it hard and found this not comfortable at all. It didn’t even get my calf right. I still did if 3 stars because it’s not too too bad but for the price I don’t think it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon I.

customer_reviews.title: This is the Rolls Royce of foot massagers/therapy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Heavenly. Addictive. Pure joy for our feet. I can’t say enough nice things about this foot massager, it far exceeds our expectations and I would highly recommend it to anyone needing to help their feet feel better. Whether your a diabetic with foot pain and numbness or a rheumatoid arthritis patient or just want to pamper yourself, this is what you need to buy. Get it now!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, even better customer service!! Received the product and it was amazing however the left vibrating bar wasn’t working. I emailed the manufacturer and they immediately sent out a replacement unit which arrived the next day. I have been using the replacement unit for the past few weeks, day and night. Can’t wait to wake up in the morning ....can’t wait to get home from work. So happy to have a great product and even more happy to deal with a company that stands behind their product!!
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Not honoring gurantee offered while buying
customer_reviews.text: The product is reasonably good for few initial months and the massage is good. But soon the pressure bag is not able to build and hold the pressure. So the feet doesn't get (pleasantly) squeezed, infact that is the most enjoyable feature of the massage. When I bought the unit, in 2017, I was offered service guarantee for 5 years. Now in 2020, the unit need some servicing and have send emails to the customer support, but I get only reply that they are checking with the product department. This is a ripoff. There is no servicing !
customer_reviews.author: HealthyLive

customer_reviews.title: great for calves
customer_reviews.text: We love this massager! The foot massage is good, but love it best for calves. The instruction booklet was easy to decipher and it is not difficult to understand the color coding or control buttons. It is not rocket science as some reviews would make you believe. The company should proofread their manual though - HEEL not HEAL in at least one spot and other areas just stop mid-sentence. The machine was relatively quiet considering all it is doing. We bought on an open box deal and it came brand new with little outer box damage. We would not pay full price for this, but we'll worth what we did pay.
customer_reviews.author: Sandn Warf

customer_reviews.title: Feels fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foot massager for several weeks, several times a day. I have very cold and numb toes from low back issues. I've lost most of my feeling and find this machine has many functions. I like the many different levels of pressure on all the controls. This shitsu Foot Massager is extremely quiet, has a very long electrical cord so I can use it anywhere and is light in weight. I recommend this machine for anyone dealing with foot issues, 5 star+
customer_reviews.author: martha plummer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Due to chemo, I have neuropathy in my feet, and also get cramps in my calves. Bonus! You can put your calves in! And lay in bed! The adjustable arm is great. I haven’t had any cramping at all, since I’ve been using this (nightly, calves and feet). My neuropathy is still there, but I believe it’s been helping. Definitely helps me fall asleep without feeling pins and needles.
customer_reviews.author: TSmith

customer_reviews.title: No remote control, otherwise wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The first day I did 3 massages with as much power as possible. Certainly felt like I had a major massage. Day 2 I cut it down to low strength and have kept it there for a few days. I am thoroughly enjoying this massager. It would be wonderful if it had a remote AND it would be very helpful to have some sort of indentation to use to carry it because it does weigh 24 pounds. I am happy I bought this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area

customer_reviews.title: Best product for poor calf/foot circulation
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I’ve made! Wow! I have MS and poor circulation due to leg and calf muscle weakness. I had to have major surgery last week and my doctors are scared I’m at risk for blood clots considering I’m not super mobile due to MS. This machine is amazing!!! I’m literally having a massage. It could be a deep tissue massage or a soothing massage. I love this machine so much! It actually might’ve saved my life. Don’t even think too hard- if you have poor circulation in your calfs or feet- this is by far the best product!
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made:  release was stuck immediately upon opening the box!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t even able to try it because the cross bar (looks like a handle) would not release. Big disappointment as I was really excited about my purchase. Sent it right back.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Start on lowest setting and wear something on your legs first time.
customer_reviews.text: This was our second massager, the first one had good reviews and was a calf and foot machine. It did neither well, it was bought locally and returned after a week. The reviews on this one were great, and we are very pleased with its performance. It is strong, has good pressure, the vibration is good. It makes my feet a little sore after, which is good. As for the calves, be careful, it has good pressure and can hurt, but only like a good hand massage. Overall great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This machine is not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: .If your a male with calves larger than 15 inches around or your shoe size is larger than 10 this machine will not work. Under these sizes your fine. I am slightly under these figures so it works fine for me,that is why I gave it a 4. If you buy this start with green not the blue default. The folks in China should have spent more time on R&D.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo H Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Good- but check website for cheaper pricing
customer_reviews.text: So far my husband loves it. He said its a good pain. I know this because he's told me about 17x in the first 20 minutes of using it haha. He originally found it on Amazon so that's where I ordered it from. When we went to look for the video we found that the website had a sale for cheaper- my fault for not checking. Do yourself a favor and check before ordering. All in all he likes it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Inghams3

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it was just my product, but it was extremely loud, I ended up returning it. I had ankle surgery so I bought it to help break up scar tissue. It hurt, so I guess it was somewhat doing the job, but it wasn't as great as other massagers I had bought and it was too loud for me. I also couldn't figure out what the red vs green lights meant and the different buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas because I can't give her the 20 minute foot rubs, focusing on pressure points anymore, (arthritis). The Shiatsu Foot Massage by Cloud Massage is the best thing since sliced bread. It is everything all the 4 and 5 star reviews say and the unit I received had non of the issues the other people complained about. Now I use it as well, great stress reliever before bed, being able to use it on the calves is a huge bonus. Any other foot massaging machine pales by comparison and simply a waste of money. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McDuffee Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great after a long day on your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Coud Massage for my husband who works in maintenance and 10 hours days on his feet. He uses the Cloud Massage mulitple times daily. It's relaxing after a long day of work and soothing for his feet, which have neuropathy. The Cloud Massage provides a true massage with the rollers and the air compression. If you want a good foot massage, we highly recommend the Cloud Massage.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Game changing relief
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from chemo induced neuropathy and swelling in my legs that caused me to walk weird and kept me from sleeping. My plantar fasciitis was painful as well causing the pain to radiate up my legs. This massager has been a total game changer for me as all of the functions have worked to relieve me of the pain and swelling. The rolling massage breaks things up and combined with the pressure to move the fluid, I am able to get around better and sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Keen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My entire family loves this thing. It is fairly easy to use, the hardest part is memorizing what each button is for. But wow does this work. I got it for my dad, since his legs are always tired from spending too much time standing at work. He uses it and falls asleep. I have only had it for 1 week, so if i dont update then this is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: rosa candelario

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I need to have major reconstruction surgery in my foot. It’s just not the right time in my life right now for that with two young children. I live in pain every single day. I still go about my daily routine because you have to. This is a total game changer!! I used it after exercising, after being in the kitchen for hours, at night before bed and I can say that my foot hasn’t felt this good in a really long time. Don’t get me wrong it doesn’t take away the pain e timely but it sure as heck has made it a lot easier to move through my day. SO excited!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Very good, compact massager
customer_reviews.text: After almost 2 weeks of usage I am writing this review. I must say that this does it's job pretty well. Especially foot massage is really good with good amount of variation options. I reduced 1 star as I would have loved to have heel massage which is kind of lacking in this product. Secondly without remote it is bit inconvenient to operate the device if you are lying down and taking the massage. Again this is not replacement of human touch massage but your calf and foot nerves gets relaxed after taking the massage from this massager and you get nice sweet pain during the process so the massager does it's job...
customer_reviews.author: Archana Joshi

customer_reviews.title: ... using the Foot Massage Machine Shiatsu Massager and immediately liked it. It seems to be helping to take ...
customer_reviews.text: I and my wife started using the Foot Massage Machine Shiatsu Massager and immediately liked it. It seems to be helping to take care of our foot problems. I would recommend making the user guide more user-friendly/explanatory and also to remake the locking/positioning mechanism that is currently not easy to operate. The Foot Massager Machine arrived by the promised time frame, well packaged and as described. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Yakov Urevich

customer_reviews.title: Good but be extremely careful!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine gives a good foot massage. Lots of different setting that can be confusing. Not impressed when using it for a calf massage. It is a large and heavy machine. Be careful when using the heat. I badly burned my calf using the heat after a couple of cycles on my feet. I was blistered and still have the scars. There should be a strong warning to only use the heat for one cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Good for a couple of weeks used.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple of weeks... after that when u change the setting or adjust the intensity of either the vibrate, air compression and the roller, one or two of them would not work, either the roller would stop or the vibration would stop and you are left with just an air compression.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A Olan

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware of False Warranty and Customer Support Claims
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a very official looking Warranty Certificate. When I attempted to register my unit for warranty via their website (as instructed) I landed on an unresponsive page. I emailed the contact person on the "Cloud Massage Team" identified in the information provided and my email bounced back. Finally, I called the phone number provided for customer support multiple times and , every time, I was unable to communicate with the person on the other side of the line due to static.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Like it even though it doesn't come with instructions
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good massager for the price ($260). It didn't come with instructions on what the different color lights mean when you press the buttons (blue green red) but we ended up looking it up and figuring it out. It does massage pretty hard on the highest setting but you will feel so good afterwards. I usually use the calf setting for 2 cycles when my calves are aching and it seems to work like magic and makes all the pain go away. The only thing that I don't like about it is the plastic creaking noise it makes when you are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Massage grip has loosened
customer_reviews.text: At first it was amazing! But after a month or so the grip has loosened and it doesnt feel as tight as when we first used it. My wife noticed it too. Giving it 2 stars since it's not as satisfying as it was in the beginning. However if I can get warranty info and they can replace it or fix it I may come back and increase it. Or is there a setting I'm missing that can make the grip tighter? Please advise- I really want to like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ron_Vong

customer_reviews.title: Hard deep massage
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out on this thing. It may be a bit much for me, but if you like a good deep massage you will like this. I have a very high arch which doesnt seem to help. Im going to keep trying as my feet feel much better after.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works well, pic for calves a little misleading
customer_reviews.text: I put this under my desk .. use it for foot massage multiple times a day while working and has relaxed my tense feet tremendously. I thought i could use for calves like in pic, but the directions say to be laying flat and that is harder to do while working. However, I have really used it and recommend. (my kids like it too).
customer_reviews.author: 2girlsmom

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best one
customer_reviews.text: I had many foot massager before. This one is probably the best. It really give you a good foot massage. My only complain is that I wish there is a remote control so I don't have to reach down. This thing is also very heavy. It's good if you have it in a permanent location. If not, it's very heavy to move it. If this thing has a remote control, I probably would give it a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lee

customer_reviews.title: Deep Tissue Massage Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I just received this foot massager today. This afternoon actually. I’ve used it three times already. I have neuromas, encapsulated toes and plantar fasciitis. I’m a mess right now due to too much walking and cleaning my Airbnb last summer. And my huge arse isn’t helping. So, I’m in PT and seeing a podiatrist and hubby massages my feet every night. I just needed something for whenever I wanted a deep massaging without bothering anyone. This so far is perfect. I’m pretty sure I’m never moving from spot. Can someone bring me a beer?
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Great massager- high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas gift from my wife but now I'm finding it's hard to keep my wife and kids from constantly using this massager- it's quickly now gone from being my gift to a family gift. It's well made and provides a range of massage settings and the heated setting is also great for our Minnesota extended winters! I have had no need to contact customer service but they contacted me to make sure I was happy with the product and they are very responsive and personal with their interactions- love this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Allan H

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband who has neuropathy in his feet and he was not interested in using it. But when I had an attack of psoriatic arthritis in my knee and ankle, I used the Cloud to massage my feet and calves and the swelling in the joints was significantly relieved. Impressed, I purchased a Cloud Massager for my 93 yr old mother who has suffered from neuropathy in her feet many years. She has massaged her feet twice per day now for a month, and has now informed me she has feeling back in the soles of her feet! My husband has started to use the Cloud now.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Amira

customer_reviews.title: Update on product
customer_reviews.text: Received the Cloud Massager, and the handle did not work properly, the locking mechanism to adjust movement was broken. Contacted the vendor directly, on a Sunday, and within 3 hours another unit was being shipped directly to me. Fantastic customer support. The product itself is great. Your feet will definitely feel better.
customer_reviews.author: michael midelton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is magical. I thought it was going to be an over priced, poorly built device, but it definitely surprised me. It has the quality of the full sized thousands-dollar chairs. It's surprisingly quiet when it operates. The wife and I love it. And you can't beat the 1 year warranty they offer.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I spend A LOT of time on my feet & this is ahhh-mazing!!! It's a little loud, but I can live with that. I'm using it as I write this & I don't often write reviews, but I debated for weeks on buying this because so many foot massagers suck(for lack of a better term). You won't be disappointed if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Real Life Perfect LLC

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a foot massager that was better than those $20 gifts you give to someone for Xmas. I deal with plantar fasciitis and try to do 15000 steps a day. This machine helps alleviate my strained fascia and deal with pain management. I was a little skeptic at first because I never heard of the brand, but so far its been great. I wish there was a better way to control the machine from my finger tips, I normally have to press the right buttons with my toes. I dont like bending over, too lazy haha. I wish the 15 minute window was longer as well. This is a decent size machine, be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: As awesome as all the reviews. Really...
customer_reviews.text: These high reviews are right. This thing is powerful and addicting. There’s life before the cloud massage, and there’s life after the cloud massage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kotter Man

customer_reviews.title: The massage is amazing, the only thing is
customer_reviews.text: The massage is amazing , the only thing is : I wish there was adjustment for the shiatsu intensity . Most days I use the mode where there is no shiatsu because it could be too rough .
customer_reviews.author: Tsvetelina Lalkovska

customer_reviews.title: Deep Massage
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It gives a consistent, complete foot massage. Because it's open, foot size doesn't really matter. The pressure is medium to deep. If it's too deep for the average person, suggestions are given in the instructions. I am a massage therapist and can say this is the best foot massager I've ever used. Comes with a one year warranty. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: h.barlow

customer_reviews.title: Great also for Restless Legs!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this massager! I have bad restless legs syndrome that somehow manifests partly in my feet. I've been using it nightly both in the "foot position" and in the "legs position" and it really diminishes the discomfort. I especially like the air pressure part that increases and diminishes -- much like the machines used in hospitals to prevent strokes after surgery. And on cold nights the heat option is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Really great foot massage
customer_reviews.text: I really like strong foot massages and if I could turn this up higher, I would. That said, the massage settings are great. I love how I can get my feet squished at the same time as the rollers and the vibration. I have it underneath my work desk at home, and I use it twice a day. It has held up to my regular use for the last 2 months. Not sure if it has gotten a bit weaker over time or if I have just gotten used to the pressure, but I wish it had a higher setting especially when it's squeezing my feet. That said, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader Man

customer_reviews.title: Cloud massager, what a wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Cloud massager, what a wonderful purchase. I have some diabetic neuropathy in my feet and so that’s what enticed me to buy this massager in the first place. The massager itself works very very well and helps to relieve some of that tingling in my toes. I’m hoping that overtime the use of this massager is going to help even more. I would highly recommend this to anyone. I did buy the open box one and saved any Normas amount of money that way.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Klepper

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he LOVES, LOVES, LOVES it!!! This is probably the best gift I have ever gotten him. He suffers with severe foot pain. I have major hand pain, so foot rubs are out of the question. This was the PERFECT solution!!! Hopefully it will last a long time, but if it doesn't we WILL be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhh..............
customer_reviews.text: Worth. Every. Penny. Not cheap, but worth it. I’m using it as I write this. I LOVE the compression. Everything is fine, but the squeeze on my feet is fantastic. I’ve used it Every night for the past week, and it’s still incredible, not getting old at all. I wish it had a remote, but whatever. Also the settings are a little mysterious, but just play around with the, for a couple minutes, they all feel wonderful anyway. It is stronger than I expected. For me, that’s great, for people with really sensitive feet, not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: Marty D Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a calf / foot massager at a retail store for $180.00, but it just was not effective. I returned the item and purchased the Cloud Massage machine and it has worked out great for me. You can really feel the machine provide a deep tissue massage. I use the machine on a nightly basis now and am considering buying a second for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Won Koh

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down THE BEST foot massage I’ve ever had in my life. I am currently 8 months pregnant and suffering from some pretty severe edema. The Cloud Massager alleviated almost all of it with just a 20 minute massage! I had previously tried ice soaks, epsom salt soaks, elevating my feet and all kinds of other supposed remedies... nothing was working. My feet and ankles were SUPER swollen when my Cloud Massager was delivered. I plugged it in and used it for literally 20 minutes and my feet and ankles were SO relieved and all the fluid around the area went away. This was DEFINITELY worth the money and I DEFINITELY recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: After trying a couple of different models from other companies, this is the one that worked for me. Because I bragged to much about and family members tried it 4 more were purchased. I think this is an amazing product and helped me when I was desperate and in pain. I had already gone to an orthopedic and change shoe styles and nothing made the pain better, then I got this massager and it's been a blessing. Yes, it's pricey but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline ovalles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Foot Feels!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this a fantastic, well-built massager. It makes my feet and calves feel amazing. Super easy to use right out of the box, too. The customer support after purchasing it has been great, too. Dropping almost $300 on a foot massager was a risk, but the Cloud experience has been great. I highly recommend to anyone on the fence. Yes, I’m using it now. 🤤
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing foot massage
customer_reviews.text: This was more than I expected. This really gives your feet a work over. Thankfully is has level adjustments for each aspect of the massage because starting out you tend to be sensitive to such a workover and can tone it a bit. The pressure created by the air bags was a real pleasant surprise. General pain and numbness in my feet has been receding gradually. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Peter Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for this foot massage. It had a clicking sound and feel in the left foot and didn’t work on high settings. Was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Murtle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years ago, I broke my heel and ankle in a car accident. I have had 2 surgeries and have 2 plates, 5 screws and 2 anchors in my ankle. My foot and calf are sore all day, everyday. I've used my massager for 2 days now and I am SO impressed. It is helping with swelling in my joint and stretching all the muscles in the bottom of my feet. My pain has seriously decreased after only 2 uses. If you are considering buying it but aren't sure if THIS is the one you should get, here is your sign telling you to BUY IT! I have used it on the second to lowest level and it is tough!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best foot relief I have found!!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from massive foot pain at work being on my feet for 8 hour shifts. Bought countless items to help but, none of them gave me the relief I so desperately needed. When I first bought it, I would get home and ice my feet for 20-30 minutes and then use this every night.... AMAZING FEELING. BEST thing EVER!!! Now I only have to use it a couple times a week and feel fine at work. (everyone is different) I really don't think you will regret buying this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle North

customer_reviews.title: Very good, great investment after a tiring day!
customer_reviews.text: The foot massager does what it says. The best part about this massager is that your feet can massage at any angle that is comfortable to you, unlike other massagers that require the feet to go straight in. Also, the plus benefit is to be able to massage the leg when you just lay your feet flat. My whole family love this!
customer_reviews.author: Fen

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing, while it lasted....
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the machine stopped working properly after 1 month & I only use 3 times a week. The other problem, No remote control.....other than that, it really does work your feet well. 👍remember, Everyone's experience may vary!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Luis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot massager in the world
customer_reviews.text: After developing Neuropathy in both feet I tried numerous foot massagers both closed and open and after sending them back I ordered a Cloud Massager. Not only did it fit my foot size (14 2E) but it did so comfortably. The range of adjustments was also a factor in my decision to keep this one.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: AAAAAMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don’t write reviews as much as I should, BUT THIS!!! THIS IS AMAZING. I am constantly on my feet for work, and have struggled with pain for so long. This helps with the pain SO MUCH. It really gets the knots out. It is powerful so be careful the first time you use it. My feet were sore after the first day from it, because I used the maximum pressure. But it was a good kind of sore! This thing is awesome, and I’m very happy I found it. I am def one happy customer, so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Oliva

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought I had already reviewed this. I have plantar fasciitis so bad I can hardly walk and there are times I have muscle spasms in my calves that I double over in pain. This has been the best investment for my entire family considering I’m on my feet 12 hours a day anywhere from 5-6/days. I feel like I have my own personal masseuse. I have enjoyed it so much I recommended it to my family. I have loaned mines to my cousin to see if she likes it before she purchases one, to bad there is not a referral program because now she’s purchasing her own.
customer_reviews.author: Matti

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Intense, yet delightful! Everyone in my family from my 10 year old to my husband love this foot massager. You can increase or decrease the pressure to whatever you prefer. I like deep pressure massages & due to COVID-19 I’ve been avoiding a real life massage. But, this has been great for basketball feet, dance feet, diabetic feet and tired feet. So, I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and is  holding up well after many, many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t say it lightly when I say this changed my life. I had no idea my feet were so tense or that the here the cause of some of the hip pain I was having until I’d used this the first few times. Months later I still use this at least 3 or 4 times a week and it works every bit as well as the day I got it. It’s gentle enough that people who try it the first time don’t feel they were abused by it but when you crank it up it really digs in and gets those deep spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery E. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It gives deep kneading foot massages, it helped relieve pain in the my arches. It is being used often because it feels great and highly recommend this massager, especially if you are a nurse or have foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Massager
customer_reviews.text: This massager really works. This is a high quality professional massager that delivers results with its ability to perform deep tissue massage. Even more amazing is the support you we receive from Heather from her company, Cloud Massage. She is a breath of fresh air where companies so often overlook service after the sale. Well done Heather!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Power to spare...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful massager. I can’t run it on full pressure....yet. Being able to change the angle on the machine is convenient, and makes it more comfortable than non-adjustable massagers. However the arm for changing the angle is a bit of a pain to use. Hard to adjust. Also there is no handle to transport the massager, and it is fairly heavy. A remote would also be convenient especially when doing your calves, and your gut challenged like me. But overall, a great massager.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Heemeryck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for Christmas. I waited a few months to see how well this product would work. Well... Lets just say EVERYONE that comes over her house asks where she got it from! They all want their own! She had a commercial grade foot massager that costco sold for a little while (more like a foot vibrator) and that is nothing compared to this. This is the best product you can buy. Do I reccomend it? Heck yes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: This unit is amazing. I got it for my wife. She has sore feet all the time and as of late has developed plantar fasciitis. The massager is already helping ease the pain. A remote control would be nice but not necessary . Our teenage daughter started using it too when she arrives home from her job as a Walmart cashier. She’s very impressed with it too. It’s going to get a LOT of use
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great massager. I also use it for my hands at the end of the day. They get tense from all the writing and typing I do. I sit it on my lap and use it for hands and arms, then I set it down and fo my feet. You can adjust intensity if needed. I own a full body chair massages, but it was so lacking with feet that I had to buy this as well.
customer_reviews.author: MattsGirlElle

product_meta.title: Cloud Massage Shiatsu Foot Massager Machine -Increases Blood Flow Circulation, Deep Kneading, with Heat Therapy -Deep Tissue, Plantar Fasciitis, Diabetics, Neuropathy
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: This electric foot massager provides a deep kneading shiatsu massage at the optimum comfort angle with an easily adjustable bar
DUAL MASSAGE: Features multiple settings for heat, air compression pressure and vibration for pain relief to your feet, legs, calves, toes and ankles
PORTABLE GIFT: Foot / Calf area is 5" wide and open-toed 11" long with air pressure cuffs deflated -fitting most foot sizes for men and women!

WARNING: We encourage you to use the lowest setting initially. Most afflictions will feel slight soreness after an initial massage after the first few uses which is normal and is how you know it is working
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: We stand by our product 100%! If you have any problems or are not satisfied with your order, we will provide a replacement or a full refund!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
